title: Optimizing fertilization schemes to narrow the maize yield gap in smallholder farming systems in southern Ethiopia
content:
Publication date: 15 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 13

Author(s): Tigist Yimer, Girma Abera, Sheleme Beyene, Arie Pieter Paulus Ravensbergen, Amrachu Ukato, Frank Rasche
